A letter to the president asking for Delta to make good on the product was ignored. customer_reviews.title: Perfect Pot Filler!
customer_reviews.text: As many others have already stated, this is solidly built, and works fast and perfectly! The aeration is a problem for some, but I don't mind it. Depending on the height where it's installed, turn on the wall faucet first, and then slowly open the main valve. If you are too high and just dump the main valve open, you *will* get splashes. When turning it off, turn it off at the *wall* first. Then shake out any drops in the end arm, and finally turn off the main valve. Fold it back up, and it looks nice against your wall!

A pot filler makes it easy to fill large cooking vessels quickly and without the walk from sink to stove.

Timeless design combined with latest technology.
